flounder.sounds

Class WavDataStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.sounds.WavDataStream

  • public class WavDataStream
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that enables streaming wav data.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • openWavStream

        protected static WavDataStream openWavStream(MyFile wavFile,
                                             int chunkSize)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new open wave data stream which can be used to stream audio data from the chosen .wav file.
        Parameters:
        wavFile - The file to be streamed.
        chunkSize - The maximum amount of data in bytes that should be read from the file each time loadNextData() is called.
        Returns:
        The open wave data stream.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If something goes wrong.

      • setStartPoint

        protected void setStartPoint(int bytesRead)
        Sets the point to start at.
        Parameters:
        bytesRead - Total bytes read.

      • loadNextData

        protected java.nio.ByteBuffer loadNextData()
        Loads the next chunk of data from the .wav file into a ByteBuffer. The amount of bytes that it attempts to load is determined by the chunkSize argument when the openWavStream() method was called to create this stream. The actual number of bytes loaded may be less depending on how close to the end of the stream it is, or if the chunkSize doesn't represent an integer number of audio frames.
        Returns:
        The loaded byte buffer.

      • hasEnded

        protected boolean hasEnded()
        Returns:
        true if the stream has read all the audio data and reached the end of the data.

      • getAlFormat
